title: The Bronx Recipe
full_text:

Ingredients

ounces

ounce
fresh orange juice
3/4
ounce
dry vermouth
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
Directions
Introduce all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake well for 10 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass; garnish with an orange wheel.
